content: I grew up speaking Swedish and English, learned German and Spanish at school, Portuguese and Romanian through two marriages, and some Russian, French, and Mandarin for fun.
translations: ita:Sono cresciuto parlando svedese e inglese, ho imparato il tedesco e lo spagnolo a scuola, il portoghese e il rumeno attr
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
